snippet: If Elena Vesnina was red faced after being on the receiving end of a 48-minute 6-2 6-0 semi-final mauling at the hands of Serena Williams -- at least it wasn't as bad as the 19-minute wipeout American Alice Marble inflicted in 1939....
lead_paragraph: If Elena Vesnina was red faced after being on the receiving end of a 48-minute 6-2 6-0 semi-final mauling at the hands of Serena Williams -- at least it wasn't as bad as the 19-minute wipeout American Alice Marble inflicted in 1939.

headline.print_headline: Equal Prize Money Debate Irks Serena
headline.main: Equal Prize Money Debate Irks Serena
